data.name: Message1Text
data.value: You found a critical bug... the project was delayed. Go back 5 spaces.

data.name: Message2Text
data.value: Successful build. You move forward with confidence. Move forward 4 spaces.

data.name: Message3Text
data.value: Merge conflict in your branch. What a shame... go back 5 spaces.

data.name: Message4Text
data.value: Your code passed all unit tests. Quality bonus: advance 4 spaces.

data.name: Message5Text
data.value: You had to reinstall Visual Studio. You waste valuable time. go back 5 spaces

data.name: Message6Text
data.value: You passed Programming Fundamentals the first time. Move forward 4 spaces.

data.name: Message7Text
data.value: IndexOutOfRangeException: you accessed outside the array goes back 5 spaces.

data.name: Message8Text
data.value: You found a programming meme that gave you the strength to continue. You advance 4 spaces

data.name: Message9Text
data.value: Your technology teacher abandoned you to go to Peru and you were late in the project, go back 5 boxes

data.name: Message10Text
data.value: You finished a sequence diagram. Move forward 4 spaces

data.name: Message11Text
data.value: NullReferenceException: You advanced without initializing. You lose your next turn.

data.name: Message12Text
data.value: Your team left you alone on the final project. You are the hero no one asked for. you earned an extra turn

data.name: Message13Text
data.value: Burnout detected… take a mandatory break. You lose a turn.

data.name: Message14Text
data.value: You passed the most difficult class of the semester. To celebrate. roll the dice again

data.name: Message15Text
data.value: You had to debug legacy code without documentation... good luck. we let you rest the next shift

data.name: Message16Text
data.value: You passed technologies at UO. You are a legend. You win a turn.

data.name: Message17Text
data.value: You have to clear 1 day of technical debt in sonarqube you lose a shift.

data.name: Message18Text
data.value: You passed technologies with 6...passing is passing. you throw again

data.name: Message19Text
data.value: You resorted to programming. you lose a turn

data.name: Message20Text
data.value: You are full stack in gpt chat prompts. It is your greatest achievement in life. you win a turn
